org.virtualwar.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.virtualwar.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board class is the class for the actual board of game containing robots, obstacle and mines.
    Author:
    amberstar

      • fillAlea

        private void fillAlea(int nm,
                      boolean containsTank)
        Fill the area with obstacle, checks if a way exist while adding obstacle.
        Parameters:
        nm - Parentage of obstacles over the field
        containsTank - true will make a path for tanks

      • generate

        public void generate(int pourcentageGen,
                     boolean containsTank)
        Generate the whole grind.
        Parameters:
        pourcentageGen - the percentage of obstacles in the way
        containsTank - True will generate for tanks, False for other (tank can't go in diagonal)

      • hasPath

      • hasPathHelper

        private boolean hasPathHelper(int[][] grindToInt,
                              int[][] tmpGrind,
                              int i,
                              int j,
                              boolean hasTank)
        recursive function for finding if a path exist only for regular units.
        Parameters:
        grindToInt - Board converted to numbers : 0 obstacle, 1 empty
        tmpGrind - array of integer (-1 : visited, 0 visited, 1 good path)
        i - equivalent to y
        j - equivalent to x
        hasTank - if true, will find a path for tanks too
        Returns:
        if tmpGrind[i][j] == 1
